description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Let the countdown begin!  A Mayan countdown to December 21st 2012!  Is there more to this then just a screensaver?  Can you unlock the 4 secret messages, that provide you with insights into the Mayan Spaceship image?  Includes a countdown timer and the current Long Count date.
description.short: Let the countdown begin!  A Mayan countdown to December 21st 2012!  Is there more to this then just a screensaver?  Can you unlock the 4 secret messages, that provide you with insights into the Mayan Spaceship image?  Includes a countdown timer and the current Long Count date.
